situation.title: Outside seating, terraces, indoor gardens
situation.meta_description: Rules for operation of outside seating, terraces and indoor gardens durring the pandemic time.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendation

Gardens, terraces and winter gardens are not allowed to operate at the moment. The general ban on the presence of the public in restaurants apply to them. Restaurants are allowed to serve only as a takeout service. It is also possible to get food delivered.

Gathering of people is prohibited in front of the restaurants. Except for household members it is necessary to keep a distance of at least 2 meters. We recommend you to eat your meal at home or in the office rather than in a crowded place in front of the restaurant. By following the increased hygienic measures and being considerate, we will be able to return to the restaurant gardens even sooner.
